string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FORMS ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, program TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, p_id TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_date DATETIME, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_object BLOB NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FORMS_VALUE ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, form_id INT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, field_name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, value TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, FOREIGN KEY (form_id) REFERENCES FORMS(id) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS LOCATION ( location_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, location_name VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, uuid VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, parent_id INTEGER, fast_location CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, pet_location CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, childhood_tb_location CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, comorbidities_location CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, pmdt_location CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, aic_location CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, primary_contact VARCHAR, address1 VARCHAR, address2 VARCHAR, city_village VARCHAR, description TEXT )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS USERS ( user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, provider_uuid VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, username VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, fullName VARCHAR NOT NULL, uuid VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, role VARCHAR NOT NULL, password VARCHAR, description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS IDENTIFIER_TYPE ( identifier_type_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, identifier_name VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, uuid VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, has_check_digit CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, description TEXT );
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO IDENTIFIER_TYPE VALUES(1,\'OpenMRS Identification Number\',\'8d793bee-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f\',\'N\',\'Unique number used in OpenMRS\');
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO IDENTIFIER_TYPE VALUES(2,\'Old Identification Number\',\'8d79403a-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f\',\'N\',\'Number given out prior to the OpenMRS system (No check digit)\');
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO IDENTIFIER_TYPE VALUES(3,\'Patient ID\',\'05a29f94-c0ed-11e2-94be-8c13b969e334\',\'Y\',\'OpenMRS patient identifier, with check-digit\');
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO IDENTIFIER_TYPE VALUES(4,\'ENRS\',\'0481be90-41be-4aa2-b0dc-0e82ccff6f5c\',\'N\',\'Registration ID assigned to MDR-TB patients\');
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO IDENTIFIER_TYPE VALUES(5,\'External ID\',\'20b16aaf-2851-4662-8292-0e7b89a82448\',\'N\',\'Patient ID in an external MRS, like MR. No.\');
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO IDENTIFIER_TYPE VALUES(6,\'endTB EMR ID\',\'8a6670cc-b8a5-474a-84e3-7b9dd16a2978\',\'N\',\'Patient Identifier type for Bahmni Registration System (endTB)\');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PATIENT ( patient_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, uuid VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, identifier VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, external_id VARCHAR, enrs VARCHAR, endtb_emr_id VARCHAR, openmrs_identifier VARCHAR, in_fast CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, in_pet CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, in_childhood_tb CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, in_comorbidities CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, in_pmdt CHAR DEFAULT \'Y\' NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, gender CHAR DEFAULT \'M\' NOT NULL, birthdate DATETIME NOT NULL, city_village VARCHAR, state_province VARCHAR, country VARCHAR, latitude DOUBLE, longitude DOUBLE, address_uuid VARCHAR, health_center VARCHAR, health_district VARCHAR, primary_contact VARCHAR, secondary_contact VARCHAR, cnic VARCHAR, description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CONCEPT ( concept_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, full_name VARCHAR UNIQUE, uuid VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL, data_type VARCHAR NOT NULL );
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO CONCEPT VALUES(39,\'LONGITUDE (DEGREES)\',\'163179AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA\',\'Numeric\');
